conversation.content: I am looking for a place to stay with free wifi.
Certainly.  What part of town are you wanting to stay in?
The north part of town please.  Are there any guesthouses?
We have ten such places.
Great! Could you book one of those for Sunday for me?
I'm sorry, there isn't anything available for Sunday. Would a different day work?
How about just 1 night?
I'm sorry there are no rooms available for that day at all. Would it be possible for your to book another day?
I really need a room for 4 people on Sunday.
I'm not sure we're going to be able to help you get a room on Sunday. Can you restate your requirements?
I need a hotel on sunday for 4 people for 3 nights.  I need the hotel to be a guesthouse with free wifi.
I actually attempted all ten guesthouses with the booking instructions, all of them are unsuccesful.  May need to try hotels or different area to move forward.
Try hotels in the north, then.
The rooms are booked then , shall I try a shorter stay?
Ok, can you try for just 1 night please?
I was able to get you in for one night at the Acorn Guest House, reference number 2T2WBNRP. Sorry it took so long. Is there anything else I can help with?
Are the shower streams strong?
According to the reviews I have on hand for that location, the opinions are mixed.  Half found the water very strong, and half found it very weak.

That won’t work—shower pressure matters when you’re traveling with 4 people. Like I said before, I need north-side options with reliable water pressure and free wifi for 3 nights. So which north hotels or guesthouses guarantee strong showers and still have space for 4 on those dates?

The Acorn Guest House has a spa that offers a relaxing experience, but the reviews on the shower pressure are mixed. One guest said it was really strong, while another said it was weak. Would you like me to check other places?

That won’t work—north-side options for 4 people, 3 nights, with guaranteed strong showers and free wifi don’t exist. Like I said before, we already went over this: either accept weaker showers or loosen the area or dates. Do you want me to search north hotels with 4-person rooms and wifi, even if shower pressure isn’t guaranteed?
I'm sorry, but I'm not able to find a hotel that meets those criteria. Would you like to try a different day, or a shorter stay?

That won’t work—north-side, 3 nights, 4 people, free wifi, and a strong shower are non-negotiable. Like I said before, we already went over this: either find something that meets all four, or stop wasting my time. <END> bye
